text: James A. K. Watson (died 24 May 1915) was a Scottish footballer who played as a forward. ==Career== Watson played club football for Rangers, and made one appearance for Scotland in 1878, scoring one goal. He later served as a committee member, vice-president, and president of Rangers. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:1915 deaths Category:Scottish footballers Category:Scotland international footballers Category:Rangers F.C. players Category:Association football forwards Category:Rangers F.C. chairmen
title: James Watson (Rangers footballer)
